author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street falls at the open, Dow off 120 pts
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks opened lower on Wednesday with the Dow Jones Industrial Average falling over 120 points as an almost 2 percent gain in the previous session failed to calm the nerves following the blue-chip indexâ€™s biggest intraday fall on Monday.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 108.2 points, or 0.43 percent, to 24,804.57. The S&P 500 lost 8.22 points, or 0.30 percent, to 2,686.92. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 22.22 points, or 0.31 percent, to 7,093.66. (Reporting by Tanya Agrawal; Editing by Arun Koyyur)
